article_title: Ohio Gov. John Kasich to Propose $500 Million Tax Cut
article_text:
Ohio Gov. John Kasich plans to unveil a state budget Monday that would reduce taxes by $500 million, a contrast to several fellow Republican governors who are wrestling with revenue shortfalls and pushing tax increases, his office said.

The former congressman—who won his second term as governor in November—cut taxes by $3 billion by reducing income taxes, slicing small business taxes and eliminating the estate tax during his first term. Mr. Kasich argued that these cuts helped spur Ohio’s economic recovery, which has...
